description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change, Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change (Covid), Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: External Relations

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: In 2021, the Adolescent Area (ADAP) continued its cross-cutting work in the face of the COVID-19 pandemic through mental health support for adolescents and youths provided by Contacto Joven. Support for adolescents on-the-move was provided in mental health and the development of skills for life and work. The GenU portfolio continued its expansion though activities to promote education continuity, life and work skills and STEM for girls. Meanwhile,the Social and Behavioural Change area scaled up its interventions, developing SBC frameworks and intervention design, with a participatory model of data gathering, design, testing and a comprehensive M&E scope. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/02/2022
